pullrequest.title: [Citadel] FrameSemantics API: add FrameAttachedToGraph and helper functions

content.raw:
I believe the types need to be public for the private methods that pass a weak pointer to the graphs, like `SetPoseRelativeToGraph(std::weak_ptr<const PoseRelativeToGraph>)`

we could forward declare a raw pointer and hide the implementation, but can we do that with a weak pointer? if so I would be open to hiding it from the public API, but I'm not sure that it's possible
